庴字的基本解释

庴
jī
古县名，在今中国四川省邛崃县。

庴
cuò
古同“厝”。

庴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》秦昔切，入昔，從。］
(1)古县名。故址在今河北省清河县东南。
(2)通“厝”。
[②]［jī］
［《廣韻》資昔切，入昔，精。］
古县名。故址在今四川省邛崃县。

庴字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庴； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页347第14
【集韻】【韻會】?秦昔切，音籍。【玉篇】縣名。【前漢·地理志】淸河郡有庴縣。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?資昔切，音積。又【集韻】七約切，音鵲。又七迹切，音磧。義?同。

庴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
庴字的起名意思

暂无。

庴
Basic explanation of words
庴
jī
Ancient county name, in present-day Qionglai County, Sichuan Province, China.
庴
cuò
The ancient same "cuo".
庴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" Qin Xi cuts into the past, from. ]
(1) The name of the ancient county. The former site was in the southeast of Qinghe County, Hebei Province.
(2) Through "cuo".
[②]［jī］
["Guangyun" Zixi cuts, enters the past, refined. ]
Ancient county name. The former site was in Qionglai County, Sichuan Province.
庴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　庴; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 347 14
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Qin Xiqie, sound book. [Jade articles] County name. [Former Han Geography] Youyu County, Cheonghe County.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zi Xiqie, phonetic product. Also [Jiyun] Qiyue cut, sound magpie. Another seven cuts, sound moraine. Righteous? Same.
庴
